name: Shit Storm
description: Your butt is lost in space. Dodge enemies and consume foods in order to survive but watch out because in space no one can hear you shit.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 2410m @ 2.3GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Let's be serious, chances are a potato can run this but this is as bad as my worst computer goes.
